verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3588>When<s%> either <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H6381>separate<s%> themselves to <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> of a <S%H5139>Nazarite,<s%> to <S%H5144>separate<s%> themselves unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

He shall <S%H5144>separate<s%> himself from <S%H4480>wine<s%> <S%H3196><s%> and strong <S%H7941>drink,<s%> and shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> or <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> of strong <S%H7941>drink,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4952>liquor<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3892>moist<s%> <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> or <S%H3002>dried.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> shall he <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H6213>made<s%> of the <S%H3196>vine<s%> <S%H4480>tree,<s%> <S%H1612><s%> from the <S%H4480>kernels<s%> <S%H2785><s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H2085>husk.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H5088>vow<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8593>razor<s%> <S%H5674>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7218>head:<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> be <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> in the <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5144>separateth<s%> himself unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6918>holy,<s%> and shall let the <S%H6545>locks<s%> of the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H1431>grow.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> that he <S%H5144>separateth<s%> himself unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body.<s%>

He shall <S%H3808>not<s%> make himself <S%H2930>unclean<s%> for his <S%H1>father,<s%> or for his <S%H517>mother,<s%> for his <S%H251>brother,<s%> or for his <S%H269>sister,<s%> when they <S%H4191>die:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H5145>consecration<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7218>head.<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> any <S%H4191>man<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H6621>very<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> him, and he hath <S%H2930>defiled<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H5145>consecration;<s%> then he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2893>cleansing,<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall he <S%H1548>shave<s%> it.

And on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtles,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him, for <S%H4480>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H5315>dead,<s%> and shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> that <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5144>consecrate<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation,<s%> and shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> for a trespass <S%H817>offering:<s%> but the <S%H3117>days<s%> that were <S%H7223>before<s%> shall be <S%H5307>lost,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H5145>separation<s%> was <S%H2930>defiled.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5139>Nazarite,<s%> <S%H3117>when<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled:<s%> he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%>

And he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> he <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> ewe <S%H3535>lamb<s%> of the <S%H1323>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%>

And a <S%H5536>basket<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread,<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H7550>wafers<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and their meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and their drink <S%H5262>offerings.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> his sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and his burnt offering: <S%H5930><s%>

And he shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread:<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H853>also<s%> his meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and his drink <S%H5262>offering.<s%>

And the <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1311>sodden<s%> <S%H2220>shoulder<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5536>basket,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafer,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of the <S%H5139>Nazarite,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H853><s%> the hair of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> is shaven: <S%H1548><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> is <S%H6944>holy<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H2373>breast<s%> and <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder:<s%> and after <S%H310>that<s%> the <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> may <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> hath <S%H5087>vowed,<s%> and of his <S%H7133>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> his <S%H5145>separation,<s%> <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H905><s%> that <S%H834>that<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H5381>get:<s%> according <S%H6310>to<s%> the <S%H5088>vow<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5087>vowed,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he must <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> On this <S%H3541>wise<s%> ye shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> unto them,
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> thee:
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> make his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H215>shine<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> thee, and be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> unto thee:
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6440>countenance<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> thee, and <S%H7760>give<s%> thee <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
And they shall <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> them.
